attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My mum is a hard working doctor who has spend eight years of her life working towards her profession. She earns £100,000 annualy, of which 40%/£40,000 is taken, leaving our family of seven with £60,000. I'm not for one minute suggesting that this is insufficient to support our family, but a proffesional footballer (the obvious example is David Beckham, who in five years is to receive £128 million from his club L.A. Galaxy) who is likely to be much better of than us, pays the same amount of tax, which is completely innapropriate. Now I am not doubting the skill of players such as David; I should know, I play club football for Southend United, but my mother has spend almost a decade of her life training to become a doctor, and it does 'rub it in her face' a bit when she gives away almost half of what she has earned to tax!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
